name: Adhesive Dressing | 5cm x 10m
description:
About

  • Adhesive Dressing Is a cotton pre-taping underwrap with a hypoallergenic adhesive for sensitive skin. Designed to be wrapped under sport tapes and adhesive bandages to prevent friction and chaffing. Most commonly used in conjunction with Elastoplast Elastic Adhesive Bandage or Elastoplast Rigid Strapping Tape.

Features

  • Adhesive Dressing is made with a porous cotton construction that allows the skin to breathe freely. With a wave construction backing paper, removal is easy, quick, and painless. Also great for securing pads, ice packs, shin guards and socks in place.
  • Adhesive Dressing for sensitive skin allows firmer, stronger, stickier bandaging to be placed over the top without worrying about rashes and other skin conditions.
  • Apply prior to taping when using rubber zinc oxide coated tapes and bandages. Common areas of application are ankles, knees and shoulders
